content: the #castawaysocks are worked toe-up in the round using basic knitting techniques the toe is made using judy s magic cast-on method the heel is shaped using a forethought heel and the cuff has a 1 1 ribbing materials needles 3 5mm and 3mm double pointed knitting needles or 3 5mm and 3mm circular needles magic loop gauge 24 stitches x 32 row = 10x10 cm yarn 50 g/150 mm any dk/fingering weight scrap yarn how to use your scraps efficiently in the pattern there are two tables with an estimated amount of yarn grams and meters you might need to knit the cast away socks sizing size your foot circumference final sock circumference size 1 16 cm 12 cm size 2 18 cm 14 cm size 3 20 cm 16 cm size 4 22 cm 18 cm size 5 24 cm 20 cm size 6 26 cm 22 cm size 7 28 cm 24 cm size 8 30 cm 26 cm note on sizing the socks have a negative ease of 4cm to prevent them falling off your calf/ankle if in doubt compare the final sock circumference with a cozy sock you own the length is variable and can be changed in every part of the pattern where the ^ symbol is found if you cannot measure the receiver s foot in the pattern there are the standard circumferences based on shoe size
